name: Ethical Smoothies Co.
description:
Congratulations! It's your first day at Ethical Smoothies Co.!

Your job is to get these delicious smoothies to the customers.

Move your fruit-shaped workers to the machines to keep them running. And make sure NOT to put them on the conveyor belt instead...

Created for Ludum Dare 43, the theme being "Sacrifices must be made". https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/ethical-smoothies-co

Music: "Quirky Dog" and "Easy Lemon" by Kevin Macleod.
